channel.title: Really need help with server please
channel.description: how do you take a source and use it as your server and then put it online? please don't tell me about port forwarding my internet because i think its a load of crap and someone told me i don't need to port forward, i just needed to make it so other people could. so how would i go about doing this? your help is greatly appreciated :)
